string-array.name: settings
string-array.item: Organization,Select your organization
Background Image,Select the background image to be used
Background Transparency,Change the transparency of the background image
Menu Transparency,Change the transparency of the menu button
Time Format,Change the format of the time
Date Format,Change format of the date

string-array.name: settings_child_time_list
string-array.item: Time Size,Change size of the time
Time Color,Change color of the time
"Time Shadow,Change color of the time's shadow"
Time Shadow Radius,Change how big the shadow is
Time Stroke Size,Change size of the stroke
Time Stroke Color,Change the stroke color
Time Format,Change how the time appears
AM/PM Capitalization,Change capitalization

string-array.name: settings_child_date_list
string-array.item: Date Size,Change size of the date
Date Color,Change color of the date
"Date Shadow,Change color of the date's shadow"
Date Shadow Radius,Change how big the shadow is
Day of Week Format,Thursday
Month and Day Format,December 01
Year Format,20XX
